problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following statements are true? [select one or more]<<
[ ] Primitive properties are defined by thermodynamics. [x] Enthalpy (H) is a derived thermodynamic property. [ ] Temperature is a derived thermodynamic property. [ ] Pressure is a basic thermodynamic property.
problem.p: Which of the following statements are true? [select one or more]

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following statements are true? [select one or more]
checkboxgroup.choice: Primitive properties are defined by thermodynamics.
Enthalpy (H) is a derived thermodynamic property.
Temperature is a derived thermodynamic property.
Pressure is a basic thermodynamic property.
